meanings.definition: A Hindu title for a spiritual teacher or guide.
meanings.sent1: The maharishi led the meditation session with calm authority.
meanings.sent2: People traveled far and wide to seek wisdom from the maharishi.
meanings.sent3: The maharishi joked that even the birds meditated better than his students.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like pearls of wisdom falling from the maharishi's lips.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the maharishi filled the room with peace and serenity.

meanings.definition: A person who is considered wise or knowledgeable in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: As a maharishi of gardening, he knew all the secrets to growing beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The maharishi of cooking shared his culinary expertise with the world.
meanings.sent3: The maharishi of technology could fix any computer problem with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent4: She was a maharishi of fashion, always ahead of the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The maharishi of literature could recite poems from memory with ease.
